requirement_tested: Client identification functionality with search and selection capabilities
user_persona: A customer service representative named Sarah who needs to quickly find client information during a support call.
user_goal: To identify and select the correct client from a search result list.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Client Search
narrative_steps.description: Sarah receives a call from a client and begins typing the client's name into the search field to locate their profile.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the search input field and start typing the client's name.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The input field is focused and a dropdown list of matching clients appears as she types.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting the Correct Client
narrative_steps.description: After seeing several matches, Sarah clicks on the correct client from the dropdown list to proceed.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the correct client from the dropdown list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown closes, and the client's information is displayed in a highlighted card with their name, ID, and contact details.

requirement_tested: Call type selection dropdown or radio button component
user_persona: A customer service agent named Mark who is logging a new call.
user_goal: To select the appropriate category for the incoming customer call.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Call Type Dropdown
narrative_steps.description: Mark needs to categorize the reason for the customer's call and clicks on the call type dropdown to view available options.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Call Type' dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown expands to show all available call types fetched from the backend API.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Call Type
narrative_steps.description: Mark identifies the relevant call type and clicks on it to make his selection.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the desired call type option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dropdown collapses and the selected call type is displayed in the dropdown field.

requirement_tested: Information recording form fields for capturing call details
user_persona: A customer service rep named Lisa who is documenting details about a customer's issue.
user_goal: To accurately record the specifics of the customer's call for future reference.

narrative_steps.title: Focusing Call Details Field
narrative_steps.description: Lisa clicks on the call details textarea to begin entering information about the customer's issue.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Call Details' textarea.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The textarea becomes focused and ready for text input.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Call Information
narrative_steps.description: Lisa types a detailed description of the customer's problem into the textarea.
narrative_steps.action: Type the call details into the textarea.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entered text is visible in the textarea and stored in the component's state.

requirement_tested: Action step recording section for documenting actions taken during calls
user_persona: A customer service agent named Tom who is resolving a client's issue.
user_goal: To document the steps he has taken to resolve the customer's problem.

narrative_steps.title: Adding an Action Item
narrative_steps.description: Tom has performed a specific action to help the customer and wants to record it in the system.
narrative_steps.action: Type action description in the input field and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A new action item appears in the list with the entered description and an unchecked completion box.

narrative_steps.title: Marking Action as Completed
narrative_steps.description: Tom has finished the documented action and wants to mark it as complete.
narrative_steps.action: Click the checkbox next to the action item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The checkbox becomes checked, indicating the action has been completed.

requirement_tested: Follow-up step recording functionality for scheduling future actions
user_persona: A customer service representative named Emma who needs to schedule a follow-up call.
user_goal: To schedule a follow-up action with a specific due date.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Follow-up Date
narrative_steps.description: Emma needs to schedule a follow-up and clicks on the date picker to select when it should happen.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the date picker input.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A calendar widget appears for date selection.

narrative_steps.title: Creating Follow-up Item
narrative_steps.description: Emma selects the date, enters a description for the follow-up, and adds it to the system.
narrative_steps.action: Select a date, enter description, and click 'Add Follow-up' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The new follow-up item appears in the list with the selected date and description.

requirement_tested: Additional information recording field for miscellaneous notes
user_persona: A customer service agent named Alex who wants to add extra context to a call log.
user_goal: To record additional observations that don't fit in other sections.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Additional Notes
narrative_steps.description: Alex has some extra information about the customer's situation and wants to record it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Additional Notes' textarea and type the information.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The textarea becomes focused and accepts text input.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Notes
narrative_steps.description: After typing the notes, Alex saves them to ensure they're recorded in the system.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save' button next to the notes textarea.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The notes are saved and persisted through the backend API.

requirement_tested: New call log creation form with all required data entry components
user_persona: A new customer service agent named Jordan who is logging his first customer call.
user_goal: To create a complete call log record with all necessary information.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Call Log Form
narrative_steps.description: Jordan fills out all required fields in the call log form including client info, call type, and details.
narrative_steps.action: Complete all fields in the new call log form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All form fields are filled with appropriate data and the submit button becomes enabled.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting New Call Log
narrative_steps.description: Jordan reviews his entries and submits the completed call log to the system.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit' button at the bottom of the form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form data is validated and sent to the backend API to create a new call log record.

requirement_tested: View open calls page displaying unresolved customer service calls
user_persona: A team supervisor named Patricia who wants to check the status of ongoing issues.
user_goal: To review all currently open customer service calls.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Open Calls Page
narrative_steps.description: Patricia goes to the open calls page to get an overview of unresolved issues.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'Open Calls' page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of open call log cards is displayed, showing client names, call types, and timestamps.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Specific Call Details
narrative_steps.description: Patricia clicks on one of the open calls to see more detailed information about it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific call log card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system navigates to the detailed view of the selected call log.

requirement_tested: View to-do calls page showing pending follow-up items
user_persona: A customer service manager named David who needs to track upcoming tasks.
user_goal: To review all pending follow-up items that require attention.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing To-Do Calls Page
narrative_steps.description: David navigates to the to-do page to see all pending follow-up items.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'To-Do Calls' page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A sortable list of pending call logs is displayed with client names, call types, and due dates.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting To-Do Items
narrative_steps.description: David wants to prioritize his work by sorting the items by due date.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Due Date' column header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The list is sorted by due date, with the most urgent items appearing first.

requirement_tested: Call log reports generation feature with export capabilities
user_persona: A customer service director named Rebecca who needs monthly performance reports.
user_goal: To generate and download a report of call logs for the past month.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Call Log Report
narrative_steps.description: Rebecca sets the date range for the last month and generates a report of all call logs.
narrative_steps.action: Set date range and click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A report preview is displayed with summary statistics and charts based on the selected date range.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting Report
narrative_steps.description: Rebecca exports the generated report in PDF format for sharing with stakeholders.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'PDF Export' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The report is downloaded as a PDF file to her computer.

requirement_tested: Client creator wizard with multi-step form for adding new clients
user_persona: A customer service representative named Kevin who needs to register a new client.
user_goal: To add a new client to the system using the multi-step wizard.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Client Creation Wizard
narrative_steps.description: Kevin opens the client creation wizard to add a new client's basic information.
narrative_steps.action: Open the client creator wizard and fill in basic information fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The first step of the wizard is displayed with basic info fields, and the 'Next' button becomes enabled.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Wizard Steps
narrative_steps.description: Kevin navigates through the wizard steps, filling in contact details and additional information.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Next' to go through each step, then click 'Submit' on the final step.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All client data is submitted to the backend API and the new client is added to the system.

requirement_tested: Client information modification interface for updating existing client data
user_persona: A customer service agent named Michelle who needs to update a client's contact information.
user_goal: To modify and save updated contact details for an existing client.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Client Information
narrative_steps.description: Michelle accesses a client's profile and clicks on the phone number field to update it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the phone number input field and enter the new phone number.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The phone number field becomes editable and accepts the new input.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Updated Information
narrative_steps.description: After updating the phone number, Michelle saves the changes to update the client record.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save' button at the bottom of the form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The updated client information is sent to the backend API and the changes are persisted.

requirement_tested: Permission control system for managing user access levels
user_persona: A system administrator named Robert who needs to configure user permissions.
user_goal: To verify that different user roles have appropriate access to system features.

narrative_steps.title: Logging in as Administrator
narrative_steps.description: Robert logs into the system with his admin credentials to access permission settings.
narrative_steps.action: Log in with admin credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Robert gains access to admin-only features including permission management tools.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Role-Based Access
narrative_steps.description: Robert navigates to different sections to confirm that admin-specific options are visible.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to various pages and check for admin-only UI elements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Admin-only configuration options and menu items are visible and accessible.

requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A customer service agent named Amanda who uses the application daily.
user_goal: To access up-to-date client and call information through the web interface.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Client Data
narrative_steps.description: Amanda navigates to the client search page which automatically fetches client data from the backend.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the client search page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads and dynamically fetches client data from the backend API for display.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Data
narrative_steps.description: Amanda refreshes the page to ensure she has the most current information.
narrative_steps.action: Refresh the browser page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page reloads and refetches all displayed data from the backend APIs.

requirement_tested: A backend API layer connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A system developer named Chris who is deploying the application.
user_goal: To ensure the backend properly connects to the database using configured environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Chris starts the backend server with the required environment variables set for database connection.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server with DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The server starts successfully and establishes a connection to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Database Operations
narrative_steps.description: Chris makes an API request that requires database access to verify connectivity.
narrative_steps.action: Make a GET request to /api/clients to fetch client data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The API returns client data from the PostgreSQL database without connection errors.
